org.wiyn.etc.inputSpectra
Class NormalizedKuruczModel

java.lang.Object
  za.ac.salt.pipt.common.Grid
      za.ac.salt.pipt.common.GenericSpectrum
          org.wiyn.etc.inputSpectra.KuruczModel
              org.wiyn.etc.inputSpectra.NormalizedKuruczModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
NormalizedSpectrum, AllowingPropertyChanges, PiptData, PiptSafelyAccessible
public class NormalizedKuruczModel
extends KuruczModel
implements NormalizedSpectrum

This class describes a power law spectrum which is normalized so that it matches a V magnitude.

Constructor Detail

NormalizedKuruczModel

public NormalizedKuruczModel(double temperature,
                             double logGravity,
                             double logMetallicity,
                             double vMagnitude)
Obtains the Kurucz model for the given temperature, gravity and metallicity and sets the V magnitude used for the normalization to the supplied value.

Parameters:
temperature - the temperature (in Kelvin)
logGravity - the logarithm of the gravity
logMetallicity - the logarithm of the metallicity
vMagnitude - the V magnitude used for the normalisation
Method Detail

nonNormalizedFlux

public double nonNormalizedFlux(double wavelength)
Returns the non-normalized power law flux at the given wavelength.

Specified by:
nonNormalizedFlux in interface NormalizedSpectrum
Parameters:
wavelength - the wavelength (in Angstrom)
Returns:
the non-normalized power law flux at the given wavelength

flux

public double flux(double wavelength)
Returns the normalized power law flux at the given wavelength. The normalization is chosen so that the flux matches the V magnitude at the respective reference wavelength.

Specified by:
flux in interface NormalizedSpectrum
Overrides:
flux in class KuruczModel
Parameters:
wavelength - the wavelength
Returns:
the normalized flux at the given wavelength

setVMagnitude

public void setVMagnitude(double vMagnitude)
Sets the V magnitude to the given value.

Specified by:
setVMagnitude in interface NormalizedSpectrum
Parameters:
vMagnitude - the V magnitude

safeSetVMagnitude

public void safeSetVMagnitude(double vMagnitude)
Checks whether the given V magnitude value lies in the interval from VNormalizedSpectrum.DEFAULT_MINIMUM_ALLOWED_V_MAGNITUDE to VNormalizedSpectrum.DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_ALLOWED_V_MAGNITUDE and, if so, assigns it to the V magnitude, using the setVMagnitude() method.

Parameters:
vMagnitude - the V magnitude
Throws:
InvalidValueException - if the given V magnitude value doesn't lie in the interval from VNormalizedSpectrum.DEFAULT_MINIMUM_ALLOWED_V_MAGNITUDE to VNormalizedSpectrum.DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_ALLOWED_V_MAGNITUDE

getVMagnitude

public double getVMagnitude()
Returns the V magnitude.

Returns:
the V magnitude
